field.label: DNS Provider
field.help: Select the DNS provider for the DNS-01 Challenge and Dynamic DNS. This is mostly needed for Wildcard Certificates, and for Dynamic DNS. To use, enable the checkbox in a Domain or Subdomain. For more information, visit Caddy DNS. Each module is community maintained.

field.label: DNS API Standard Field
field.help: This is the standard field for the API Key. The field can be left empty if optional. Specify according to the selected DNS provider, e.g., Cloudflare api_token, Duckdns api_token, DigitalOcean auth_token, Godaddy api_token, Gandi bearer_token, IONOS api_token, deSEC token, Route53 access_key_id, Porkbun api_key, ACME-DNS username, Netlify personal_access_token, Njalla api_token, Google Cloud DNS gcp_project, Azure tenant_id, OVH endpoint, Namecheap api_key, PowerDNS server_url, DDNSS api_token, Linode api_token, Tencent Cloud secret_id, Dinahosting username, Hexonet username, Mail-in-a-Box api_url.

field.label: DNS API Additional Field 1
field.help: Leave empty if the selected DNS Provider isn't specified here. Specify additional optional fields as needed, e.g., Duckdns override_domain, Route53 secret_access_key, Porkbun api_secret_key, ACME-DNS password, Azure client_id, OVH application_key, Namecheap user, PowerDNS api_token, DDNSS username, Linode api_url, Tencent Cloud secret_key, Dinahosting password, Hexonet password, Mail-in-a-Box email_address.

field.label: DNS API Additional Field 2
field.help: Leave empty if the selected DNS Provider isn't specified here. Specify additional optional fields as needed, e.g., Route53 max_retries, ACME-DNS subdomain, Azure client_secret, OVH application_secret, Namecheap api_endpoint, DDNSS password, Linode api_version, Mail-in-a-Box password.

field.label: DNS API Additional Field 3
field.help: Leave empty if the selected DNS Provider isn't specified here. Specify additional optional fields as needed, e.g., Route53 aws_profile, ACME-DNS server_url, Azure subscription_id, OVH consumer_key, Namecheap client_ip, DDNS password.

field.label: DNS API Additional Field 4
field.help: Leave empty if the selected DNS Provider isn't specified here. Specify additional optional fields as needed, e.g., Route53 region, Azure resource_group_name.

field.label: DNS API Additional Field 5
field.help: Leave empty if the selected DNS Provider isn't specified here. Specify additional optional fields as needed, e.g., Route53 token.
